summary.span: 为用于呈现 ASP.NET 移动控件的所有 对象提供基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for all objects used for rendering ASP.NET mobile controls.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类及其继承的类提供服务和适配器，以执行呈现的帮助器方法。The class and its inherited classes provide services and helper methods for adapters to perform rendering.

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

span.span: The URL string.

summary.span: 写入给定 URL，并针对目标设备正确对其进行编码。

span.span: Writes the given URL, encoding it correctly for the target device.

summary.span: URL 可以包括参数。

span.span: The URL might include parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks URL 将转换根据 URL 编码的规范。The URL is translated in accordance with the specification for URL encoding. 例如，URL 的主要部分中的空格转换为 %20、 URL 的参数部分中的空格转换为加号 （+），/ 字符转换为 %2f 等等。For example, spaces in the main part of the URL are translated into %20, spaces in the parameter part of the URL are translated into plus (+) signs, the '/' character is translated into %2f, and so forth. 派生的编写器类可以重写此方法。Derived writer classes can override this method.

related.span: 自适应控件行为的体系结构概述

span.span: Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior

related.span: 适配器集功能

span.span: Adapter Sets Functionality

summary.span: 写入给定的 URL 参数文本，并针对目标设备正确对其进行编码。

span.span: Writes the given URL parameter text, encoding it correctly for the target device.

span.span: The string to be added.

param.name: argument
param.span: 如果参数为 ，则将该字符串视为 URL 参数的一部分进行编码。

span.span: If argument is , the encoding is done as if the string were a part of the URL parameters.

param.span: 如果参数为 ，则将该字符串视为 URL 路径部分的一部分进行编码。

span.span: If argument is , the encoding is done as if the string were part of the path portion of the URL.
